main_page_features_management_gantt_and_: JustDo's fully-featured Gantt with Cross Project Dependencies. Enabling efficient planning, coordination, and tracking to keep projects on schedule.
main_page_features_management_multiple_p: Efficiently manage multiple projects under one overarching structure.
main_page_features_management_risk_manag: Effectively identify, assess, and manage risks with JustDo's robust risk management features, ensuring project success and resilience.
main_page_features_management_time_track: Accurately track time spent on tasks with JustDo's intuitive time tracking feature, ensuring transparent and precise resource allocation.
main_page_features_management_resource_a: Effectively manage resources and workload with JustDo, optimizing task allocation and ensuring balanced distribution across team members.
main_page_features_communication_choose_: Selective tasks sharing allows you to invite clients, vendors, and stakeholders to your board seeing only what shared with them.
main_page_features_communication_emails_: Send emails directly to tasks, maintaining a comprehensive record of all communications, including those with external collaborators not using JustDo.
main_page_features_communication_chat_ch: Dedicated chat for each task enhance communication and teamwork, enabling real-time discussions and collaboration within the context of your project.
main_page_features_communication_files_s: Easy access, sharing, and organization of project-related documents and resources.
main_page_features_communication_meeting: Effortlessly manage meetings, tracking tasks created and decisions made.
main_page_all_projects_all_collaborators: All projects · All collaborators · One common space
fully_source_available_content: Every client has unique needs. JustDo's design is highly modular, with modern and easily navigable code. Add the finishing touches your client requires, and you're ready to ship.
